attributes.1: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, there is no mention of a member of House Mallister named Jaremy.==References==ReflistMallister navboxDEFAULTSORT:Mallister, JaremyCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 3 CharactersCategory:Status: DeadCategory:House Mallister

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no mention of a member of House Mallister named Jaremy.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 3]]===
Ser Jaremy was among the prisoners of the joint [[North]]ern-[[The Riverlands|Riverlands]] army held captive at [[Harrenhal]]. Before abandoning the castle, Ser [[Gregor Clegane]] had all the prisoners put to the sword. When the Northern army, led by [[Robb Stark]], discovered the corpses, [[Catelyn Stark]] recognizes Ser Jaremy.<ref>"[[Valar Dohaeris]]"</ref>
